name: Arm Circles
setup: Stand tall, feet hip-width, arms relaxed at sides
Light brace; ribs stacked over pelvis
steps: Lift arms to the sides and begin small forward circles
Gradually increase diameter to comfortable range
safety: Pain-free range only. Reduce arc or lower arms if pinching occurs.

prescriptionHints.notes: Use early in warm-up to lubricate shoulder joint.

joints.notes: Keep upper traps relaxed; stop with sharp pain.
